text: Gerardo Clemente R. Vega García (28 March 1940 – 22 June 2022) was a Mexican general and politician. He was the Secretary of National Defense from 2000 until 2006 during the Vicente Fox administration. Vega was born in Puebla de Zaragoza, Mexico. Vega died on 22 June 2022 in Mérida, Mexico at the age of 82.Falleció Gerardo Clemente Vega García, exsecretario de la Defensa Nacional con Vicente Fox ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican generals Category:People from Puebla (state)
title: Gerardo Clemente Vega
